raw: * Abstract class to compute the position of an object on one axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract class to compute the position of an object on one axis.

raw: * Computes the start of the object on the axis
* @param size {Integer} Size of the object to align
* @param target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map
* should have the keys start and end.
* @param offsets {Map} Map with all offsets on each side.
* Comes with the keys start and end.
* @param areaSize {Integer} Size of the axis.
* @param position {String} Alignment of the object on the target. Valid values are
*   <ul>

*
  • edge-start The object is placed before the target

*
  • edge-end The object is placed after the target

*
  • align-startThe start of the object is aligned with the start of the target

*
  • align-centerThe center of the object is aligned with the center of the target

*
  • align-endThe end of the object is aligned with the end of the object
* @return {Integer} The computed start position of the object.
* @abstract

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the start of the object on the axis

@param.name: @param
@param.body: size {Integer} Size of the object to align
@param.description: Size of the object to align

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys start and end.
@param.description: Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys start and end.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: offsets {Map} Map with all offsets on each side. Comes with the keys start and end.
@param.description: Map with all offsets on each side. Comes with the keys start and end.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
position {String} Alignment of the object on the target. Valid values are
  • edge-start The object is placed before the target
  • edge-end The object is placed after the target
  • align-startThe start of the object is aligned with the start of the target
  • align-centerThe center of the object is aligned with the center of the target
  • align-endThe end of the object is aligned with the end of the object
@param.description:
Alignment of the object on the target. Valid values are
  • edge-start The object is placed before the target
  • edge-end The object is placed after the target
  • align-startThe start of the object is aligned with the start of the target
  • align-centerThe center of the object is aligned with the center of the target
  • align-endThe end of the object is aligned with the end of the object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The computed start position of the object.
@return.description: The computed start position of the object.

raw: * Computes the start of the object by taking only the attachment and
* alignment into account. The object by be not fully visible.
* @param size {Integer} Size of the object to align
* @param target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map
* should have the keys start and end.
* @param offsets {Map} Map with all offsets on each side.
* Comes with the keys start and end.
* @param position {String} Accepts the same values as the position
*   argument of {@link #computeStart}.
* @return {Integer} The computed start position of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the start of the object by taking only the attachment and alignment into account. The object by be not fully visible.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: size {Integer} Size of the object to align
@param.description: Size of the object to align

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys start and end.
@param.description: Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys start and end.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: offsets {Map} Map with all offsets on each side. Comes with the keys start and end.
@param.description: Map with all offsets on each side. Comes with the keys start and end.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: position {String} Accepts the same values as the position argument of {@link #computeStart}.
@param.description: Accepts the same values as the position argument of {@link #computeStart}.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The computed start position of the object.
@return.description: The computed start position of the object.

raw: * Whether the object specified by start and size
* is completely inside of the axis' range..
* @param start {Integer} Computed start position of the object
* @param size {Integer} Size of the object
* @param areaSize {Integer} The size of the axis
* @return {Boolean} Whether the object is inside of the axis' range
